SEARCH
Package com.StudentsBase.StudentsBase

Class StudentService

java.lang.Object
com.StudentsBase.StudentsBase.StudentService
@Service public class StudentService extends Object
The StudentService class provides operations for managing students in the database.
Since:
JDK 17
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mariusz Gruszczynski, Mateusz Pysera

      Parameters:
      studentRepository - repository for student-related database operations
      gradeRepository - repository for grade-related database operations
      subjectRepository - repository for subject-related database operations

      public Student getStudent(Long id)
      Gets a student by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      the student with the given ID
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the student is not found

    • addStudent

      public Student addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a new student to the database.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to be added
      Returns:
      the added student
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the student already exists
      IllegalArgumentException - if the index number does not contain only digits

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent(Long id)
      Deletes a student from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the student to be deleted

    • updateStudent

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the updated student

    • addSubjectToStudent

      public Student addSubjectToStudent(Long studentId, Long subjectId)
      Assigns a subject to a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      subjectId - the ID of the subject
      Returns:
      the updated student
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the student or the subject is not found or the subject is already assigned

    • getSubjectsAssignedToStudent

      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      list of the assigned subjects
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the student is not found

    • removeSubjectFromStudent

      public void removeSubjectFromStudent(Long studentId, Long subjectId)
      Removes a subject from a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the ID of the student
      subjectId - the ID of the subject
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the student or the subject is not found or the subject is not assigned to the student
